attributes.action: Strip the leaders of the Banks of their Peerages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are the heads and leaders of these banks able to keep their titles? 

Surely with the state of our economy and the large salaries that they are still drawing they should be removed of these titles. If an internet hacker had caused this damage to an economy, he would be in prison!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
